statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_method FROM transaction_details ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE payment_method = 'Cash' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM transaction_details WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT AVG(amount), MAX(amount), MIN(amount) FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_method FROM transaction_details WHERE amount >= 500 AND payment_method IN ('Cash', 'Online Transfer') ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT log_description FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions INNER JOIN customers ON transactions.transaction_id = customers.customer_id WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, transaction_id, log_description FROM customers LEFT JOIN transaction_logs ON customers.customer_id = transaction_logs.transaction_id WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'Paypal') ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Transactions;
SELECT amount, date FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM PaymentMethods WHERE method_id < 5;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, date, payment_method FROM Transactions JOIN Customers ON Transactions.transaction_id = Customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM Transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT method_name, method_description FROM PaymentMethods WHERE method_id = 2;
SELECT date, amount FROM Transactions WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT customer_name, amount, method_name FROM Customers INNER JOIN Transactions ON Customers.customer_id = Transactions.transaction_id AND Transactions.amount > 500 ORDER BY customer_name ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT method_name FROM payment_methods ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price < 50 ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT method_name FROM payment_methods WHERE method_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT * FROM payments JOIN payment_methods ON payments.payment_id = payment_methods.method_id
